egg_roll_v2.Level¶

class egg_roll_v2.Level(grid: tuple[tuple[str, ...], ...])¶

This class is the model handling all logic involving the grid.

Variables

  • emoji_set – Set of tiles for emoji levels (🥚, 🟩, 🧱, 🍳, 🪹, 🪺, ✨)

  • ascii_set – Set of tiles for ascii levels (0, ., #, P, O, @, *)

  • themes – Set of all allowed TileSet

  • grid – The 2D matrix filled with string representing the tiles

  • rows – The number of rows of the grid

  • cols – The maximum row length of the grid

  • eggs – The mutable array of egg coordinates in the grid

  • gaps – The immutable array of all the gaps in a non-square grid

  • key – The TileSet dataclass of the characters used by the grid

__init__(grid: tuple[tuple[str, ...], ...]) → None¶

Initializes all of the variables of the Level instance.

Parameters

grid (tuple[tuple[str, ...], ...]) – The grid of tiles to be processed

Raises

ValueError – Raised for grids that don’t follow a TileSet

Methods

__init__(grid)

tilt(degree, moves_left)

The main logical interaction with the player! Simulates a tilting of the board, which moves the eggs.
